criterion: Provides a concise and accurate step-by-step rescue and CPR approach for a child pulled from a pool
Does not include any harmful or misleading information in the rescue and CPR approach
Does not provide specific guidance on secondary drowning after CPR
Does not acknowledge the importance of proper training for rescue and CPR
The assistant response is clear, concise, and easy to understand
The assistant does not skip any crucial steps in the rescue and CPR approach
The assistant does not provide conflicting or outdated information in the rescue and CPR approach
The assistant asks for clarification on secondary drowning after CPR
The assistant provides an incomplete or unclear rescue and CPR approach
The assistant does not provide any information on rescue and CPR for children
